choices: An average thin teen wanting to become stronger
1.content:
A mysterious new pill is hitting the streets. The results of it are about to change the lives of the users forever.

Who will find it first?
1.title: A Pill's Power

11.content: Jason was just going into his sophmore year. There really wasn't anything special about him at all. He had flame red hair and was about 5' 4". He decided to stop into a convience store one day for some beef jerky when he saw the new shelf of Supplement X. As he looked around, he noticed that there were different pills for different muscle groups. He thought it would be great if the stuff really worked so he decided to buy...
11.title: An average thin teen wanting to become stronger

info.brief_description: A new muscle growth supplement is hitting the stores. This one is mainly on guys.
info.description:
I know this is a bit similar to other stories but bear with me. This will focus mainly on male teen growth.

There are different types of Supplement X. Each pill will add 10 pounds of muscle onto the muscle group that the type of pill is.
ex. Bicep Supplement X would add ten pounds to your biceps only.
p.s. each pill increases your height by 1 inch

The pills can be found at any store. Anything is allowed.
